channel.title: Quick and easy questions
channel.description:
Source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543033.20.html
A few questions.
How can i relocate the shops to edgevill and how can i remove the shops. Whenever i remove or change items the server crashes
And i keep seeing a other server name while i changed everything. Clientsided: gui.txt client.txt serversided: server.txt client.txt

item.title: Quick and easy questions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You can’t really “move a shop”. A shop is just a container of items. What you have to do is move the Npc that opens the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick and easy questions
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Don’t forget to compile and change the name is also in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick and easy questions
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

autospawn.cfg if i remember correclty in delta for moving npcs.

shops.cfg for editing shops

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
